widgets.title: Top Applications by Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Server : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Routine : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' FACET name

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Type : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' FACET transactionType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by SubType : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' FACET transactionSubType

widgets.title: Top Application Errors : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Transaction : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' FACET transactionName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Host : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' FACET host
